long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MergeCall Chrome Dialer is a streamlined solution for initiating calls via mergecall.com with a single click, seamlessly redirecting users to the mergeCall dialer. Our Chrome Extension empowers users with efficient features, including:
- Instant one-click calling from your CRM
- Text messaging capability
- Call answering functionality
- Convenient call note entry
- Access to recent calls and conversations
